creator: joeo@enigmastation.com
text:
With Tomcat 4.0.4-b2 (at least, haven't gotten 'round to testing others) you
must have taglib .tlds external to the taglib .jars themselves, it seems. On
other containers, such as Orion, you're able to put the TLD in the .jar file, in
META-INF. This is very, very convenient behavior. The servlet spec does not,
however, require this behavior.

creator: joeo@enigmastation.com
text:
In the JSP1.1 spec, section 5.2.1, and the JSP1.2 spec, section 7.2.1, it does
indeed specify that a packaged taglib .jar can have the TLD in a jar file, in
the META-INF directory. My original assumption was that it was in the spec, but
I couldn't find it; then I found it in both specs. Thus, the RI is not following
the spec; no longer an enhancement but an actual bug.

The latest versions of TC4 and TC5 support the use of .tld files within .jar 
files.
